text: مَا كَانَ لِىَ مِنْ عِلْمٍۭ بِٱلْمَلَإِ ٱلْأَعْلَىٰٓ إِذْ يَخْتَصِمُونَ

translation.en.sahih: I had no knowledge of the exalted assembly [of angels] when they were disputing [the creation of Adam].
translation.id.indonesian: Aku tiada mempunyai pengetahuan sedikitpun tentang al mala'ul a'la (malaikat) itu ketika mereka berbantah-bantahan.
